div.p: K.G.F. and F.D. planned the experiment. S.P., M.X., and K.G.F. performed the measurements and analysed the data. M.F. and E.X. contributed to the development of the measurement software. A.P.-R., M.S., and E.S. provided the theory support. K.I. and Y.N. provided the JPA samples. F.D., A.M., and R.G. supervised the experimental part of this work. S.P. and K.G.F. wrote the manuscript. All authors contributed to discussions and proofreading of the manuscript.
